## Working with Shiny

Multi-user authentication is possible using the `googleAuthR` functions `with_shiny`.

An example of this is the [BigQuery Visualiser](https://mark.shinyapps.io/bigquery-viz/)

The code for this is [open sourced.](https://github.com/MarkEdmondson1234/BigQuery-Visualiser)
